name: Roomba
description:
Roomba

You're a Roomba in this world filled with nothing but endless white void that's tainted with dirt. As the sole denizen of this world, it is your job to clean and make it spotless.

Seriously though, I just wrote this in a couple hours simply because I'm absolutely bored.

So, I've decided to learn a new game framework in my new favorite programming language (Kotlin) called Korge and I somehow ended up with this random idea of a Roomba software toy with procedurally generated dirt™.

Anyway, I will publish the source code later so the whole world can see my janky code.

For now, just enjoy the game.
